content: this is a legal case that took place in the municipal court split it involved a coownership dispute over a specific part of a property in croatia the case lasted for almost 6 years and was resolved by dissolving the coownership the property was sold at a public auction and the proceeds were divided equally between the parties the judge made this decision based on the property act and considering the arguments presented by both parties the petitioner wanted to keep the property while the counterparty preferred a monetary settlement the judge determined that a public auction was the best option and also took into account the special needs of the parties throughout the process
